mapper.select: select * from facility order by fa_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into facility(fa_rg_num, fa_name, fa_add, fa_add_detail, fa_phone, fa_pay, fa_locker, fa_toilet, fa_shower, fa_smoking, fa_machine, fa_note) values (#{facility.fa_rg_num}, #{facility.fa_name}, #{facility.fa_add}, #{facility.fa_add_detail}, #{facility.fa_phone}, #{facility.fa_pay}, #{facility.fa_locker}, #{facility.fa_toilet}, #{facility.fa_shower}, #{facility.fa_smoking}, #{facility.fa_machine}, #{facility.fa_note})
